hideTagRenderingsWithLabels.description:
TagRenderings with any of these labels will be removed from the layer.
Note that the 'id' and 'group' are considered labels too

osmTags.description: Every source must set which tags have to be present in order to load the given layer.

maxCacheAge.description: The maximum amount of seconds that a tile is allowed to linger in the cache

osmTags.description: Every source must set which tags have to be present in order to load the given layer.

maxCacheAge.description: The maximum amount of seconds that a tile is allowed to linger in the cache

geoJsonZoomLevel.description: To load a tiled geojson layer, set the zoomlevel of the tiles

isOsmCache.description:
Indicates that the upstream geojson data is OSM-derived.
Useful for e.g. merging or for scripts generating this cache

mercatorCrs.description: Some API's use a mercator-projection (EPSG:900913) instead of WGS84. Set the flag `mercatorCrs: true`  in the source for this

idKey.description:
Some API's have an id-field, but give it a different name.
Setting this key will rename this field into 'id'

path.description:
The path to the icon
Type: icon

class.description:
A hint to mapcomplete on how to render this icon within the mapping.
This is translated to 'mapping-icon-<classtype>', so defining your own in combination with a custom CSS is possible (but discouraged)

snapToLayer.description: If specified, these layers will be shown to and the new point will be snapped towards it

maxSnapDistance.description:
If specified, a new point will only be snapped if it is within this range.
Distance in meter

Default: 10

path.description:
The path to the  icon
Type: icon

class.description: Size of the image

path.description:
The path to the  icon
Type: icon

class.description: Size of the image

maxZoom.description:
All zoom levels above 'maxzoom' are not clustered anymore.
Defaults to 18

minNeededElements.description:
The number of elements per tile needed to start clustering
If clustering is defined, defaults to 250
